name: lamb tagine
ingredients: 1 lamb shoulder of about 1 kg cut into large cubes
steps: The day before, soak the dried apricots in water. Cut the lamb shoulder into cubes.
In a pot/tagine, saut√© the chopped onions in 3 tablespoons of olive oil. Set the onions aside.
Add 2 tablespoons of olive oil. Brown the pieces of meat until golden.
Add the reserved onions, chopped garlic, chicken stock cube, honey, and all the spices (coriander, cinnamon, ginger, saffron, cumin, nutmeg, cayenne pepper).
Add 25 cl of water. Cover and let simmer gently for about 1 hour.
Add the drained apricots and finish cooking for about 20 minutes.
When serving, flavor with rose water (if used), sprinkle with almonds and fresh coriander. Serve with semolina.
